Plant press: Use the clothes iron to press and dry delicate plant specimens for scientific or artistic purposes.
DIY hair straightener: Use the clothes iron to straighten and style hair, as it can heat up to the same temperature as a hair straightener.
Shoe deodorizer: Place a cloth scented with baking soda or potpourri inside the clothes iron and use it to deodorize shoes and shoes.
Pest repellent: Use the clothes iron to heat up scented oils or spices and place them near areas where pests are a problem.
Crafting tool: Use the clothes iron to heat up glue sticks, fabric glue, or hot glue for various crafting projects.
